definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: gird, encompass, equip (Talm. id., Ar. 0’az=ara, Aram. in deriv. Lag:BN 177 der. fr. wazara).

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[אָֽזְרוּ]] 1Sa 2:4; Impf. sf. [[יַאַזְרֵנִי]] Job 30:18; 2 ms. [[תֶּאֱזוֹר]] Je 1:17; Imv. [[אֱזׇר־נׇא]] Job 38:3, Job 40:7; Pt. pass. [[אָזוּר]] 2Ki 1:8; —gird, gird on, sq. acc. reiloins [[חֲלָחֶיךָ]] Job 38:3, Job 40:7, [[מָתְנֶיךָ]] Je 1:17; pass., subj. [[אֵזוֹר]], [[וְאֵזוֹר עוֹר אָזור בְּמָתְנׇיו]] 2Ki 1:8; cf. act. c. acc. pers. Job 30:18 [[כְּפִי כֻתָּנְתִּי יַאַזְרֵנִי]], subj. [[לְבוּשִׁי]] v. Di; fig. 1Sa 2:4 [[אָֽזְרוּ חַיִל]]

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נֶאֱזׇר]] fig. Ps 65:7 of God ([[בִּגְבוּרֶה]] ´[[נ]]) girded with might.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[וַתְּאַזְּרֵנִי]] Ps 18:40, Ps 30:12; [[וַתַּזְרֵנִי]] 2Sa 22:40 (Ges:§ 68 R 2); Pt. sf. [[הַמְּאַזְּרֵנִי]] Ps 18:33; cstr. [[מְאַזְּרֵי]] Is 50:11 but cf. infr.—gird,c. 2 acc. (pers. & rei) fig., Ps 18:40 = 2Sa 22:40, Ps 18:33 ([[חַיִל]]); Ps 30:12 ([[שִׂמְחָה]]); acc. rei om. Is 45:5; acc. pers. om. [[מְאַזְּרֵי זִיקוֹת]] Is 50:12; but rd. rather [[מְאִירֵי]] cf. Is 27:11 (SyrVer Kn Brd Di).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִתְאַזׇּ֑ר]] Ps 93:1; Imv. [[הִתְאַזְּרוּ]] Is 8:9, Is 8:9—gird oneself, for war Is 8:9, Is 8:9; with [[עׂז]] Ps 93:1 (subj. ´[[י]]).
